Text:
I have been using this application in MixMeister and there it works perfecly. Used correcly it's the greatest invention since the vbr mp3 format. The only thing I miss in it is a "deesser".

In Winamp it was easy to install and and register but its functionality is at best unstable and unreliabe and as it already works on my pc there is possibly something wrong with this install, and thats a pity! 

Admittedly it might still work better for somone else though.

Works beautifully for me in Winamp 5.541
No install issues at all. Great plugin ..Thanks!

Perfect. Easy. Must Have plug in for Winamp. 
Thanks FAnTAsYmIND.

Whoever the fuck is still seeding this beauty  five fucking years on, I thank you. Seriously. You are a fucking god. I award you one fucking internet. You can have my eldest daughter to do with what you will. TPB fucking rocks. TPB is dead! Long live TPB!
